name: Potunas
author: NASCARGIRL88
summary: Great recipe I got from my stepmother. Potatoes and tuna that can be made like a twice baked potato, or a casserole.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained, or more to taste
4  green onions, chopped, or to taste
½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Wrap potatoes in aluminum foil and place on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until tender when pierced with a fork, about 1 hour
Cool potatoes until easily handled; cut in half
Scoop the potato flesh into a large bowl, leaving the shells intact
Mix potato with tuna, mayonnaise, and green onions
Press shredded Cheddar cheese on top of each
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until cheese is melted
